pages.text:
Scroll
Gregor MacGregor’s Mini Links & Drinks combines some of Florida’s favorite pastimes: a round of golf, a tasty drink, and beautiful scenery in the heart of historic Fernandina Beach. Enjoy our lush garden putt-putt course, beachy bar, and cool, comfy patio to enjoy with friends. Stop by on your next visit to Fernandina Beach!
(That means a rootin’ good time)
Woman playing mini gold
Shot glass with lemon and pretzel behind
About our namesake
Just who is Gregor MacGregor? He was quite the scalawag. Read more about our infamous namesake.
Old Portrait of Gregor MacGregor
... score and some-odd years ago, a Scottish adventurer named Gregor MacGregor landed in the beach and laid claim to Amelia Island to
fly the green
flag of the Republic of the Floridas. Thankfully, no inhabitants were
kilt
in the coup. MacGregor may have
putt
Amelia under Scottish rule in 1817, but he sure didn’t
take it the fairway!
MacGregor’s brazen conquest turned out to be a
load of haggis
before the year’s end and Amelia was soon passed to other victors, but MacGregor became an infamous part of our local history. Today, we chuckle at the memory of this
scoundrel Scotsman
; and we welcome you to Fernandina’s newest golf club, Gregor MacGregor’s Mini Links & Drinks.
We your whistle after an afternoon of golf!
FROZEN DRINKS
COCKTAILS
FOOD
ICE CREAM & FREEZIES
